appName.message: Li-cursis tsa cursiw - mofuta oa toeba ea hau
appName.description: Sehlooho sa kopo, e bonts'itsoeng lebenkeleng la webo.

appDesc.message: Ho eketsa litlamorao tse qabolang neng kapa neng ha u tsamaisa toeba ea hau.Katoloso ena e etsa panya ea hau ho theha litlamorao.
appDesc.description: Tlhaloso ea kopo, e bonts'itsoeng lebenkeleng la webo.

stopExtension.description: Ha o tobetsa, katoloso e atisang ho fihlela e itsamaela.

startExtension.description: Ha o tobetsa, katoloso e nolofalletsa ho fihlela e sa sebetse.

popupTitle.message: Khetha phello ea hau ea mouse
popupTitle.description: Thile ha fensetere ea popo e buloa.

ratingBtn.description: Konopo e bulehileng fensetere e ncha ho lekola katoloso bakeng sa mosebelisi.

askQuestion.description: Molaetsa oa Tlhokomeliso o hlahile ha mosebelisi a etela matsatsi a fetang a 3.

ratingQuestion.message:
Rea leboha ka ho natefeloa!
 Ka kopo lekanya katoloso!
ratingQuestion.description: Molaetsa oa Tlhokomeliso o hlahile ha mosebelisi a etela matsatsi a fetang a 3.
